array.name: mock_posts
array.item: Once, just once, I\'d like the community to give back to me.
I was going to work out today, but luckily it rained.
I may have multiple personality disorder, but at least I have each other
Wait, so you are telling me that the movie Pompeii DOESN\'T feature a montage of the city being distroyed as Bastille\'s hit single "Pompeii" plays in the background?
My favorite part is when you think you are getting to the end of the chapter, but the decimals keep going up: 4.8, 4.9, 4.10?, 4.11?!?
Why can\'t alcohol make me super smooth like movie people instead of make me say dolphin facts slightly louder than usual?
What idiot named them "female identified gargoils" instead of gargirls?
When Walter White pronounced Aqueous like "Ah-queous" it really broke the immersion.
When a broken vending machine eats your money and then lights up the "thank you" sign.
I hate how twitter only does C syntax highlighting for preprocessor instructions.
